review: Works well enough. You loose video quality when using this. I watch NetFlix thru my Xbox and wanted to be able to take my tablet over to my friends house to watch NetFlix there. Connected and set up Chromecast at home to make sure it worked. Watched NetFlix thru my Xbox then the Chromecast. There is a noticeable drop in video quality between them.
author: Spider
